title: Westside Charming 2br 2bh apartment short term/long term
posting_body: The unit is fully furnished.
All utilities  and high speed Wi-Fi is included.
Month to month.
Minimum 3 months, available 08/01/2022.
This fabulous 2bedroom 2 bathroom condo is located in the Heart of West Los Angeles.
It is clean, bright, and comfortable.
It is about 10 miles from LAX,  about 3 miles west of Beverly Hills, about 3 miles east of Santa Monica Pier, about 2 miles south of Brentwood/Westwood, and about 3 miles north of Venice.
It is few minutes walk to the train station.
We have gated free gust parking under the building.
It is on the 2nd floor in a big complex centrally located in Los Angeles.
There is elevator access and gated secure garage parking on site.
It is very private, light and bright w/ hardwood floors, carpet in the bedrooms.
It has a good size kitchen with all the appliances --oven, microwave, stove, dishwasher, refrigerator and housewares.
The counter top can serve as a breakfast bar.
The living room is spacious.
There is a small balcony with plants and flowers with the view of the tree tops and beautiful sunset each night.
The master bedroom is extremely roomy and  comfortable.
It has a Cal King bed, computer desk,  and it still has lots of room for yoga and mediation.
It has a big window with the view of the tree tops.
Very private and quite with shades and curtains.
The on suite  has its own hot tub, shower and double sinks.
The 2nd bedroom features a queen size bed,  a full length mirror with a closet behind the mirror.
It is a quiet, clean, and comfortable room.
Its bathroom is newly remolded.
The Washer/dryer is located inside the unit.
The unit has central air conditioning and heat with digital thermostat control located inside the unit.
